meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the residua left in the test tube.
meanings.sent2: After the party, the only residua were a few empty cups and plates.
meanings.sent3: The residua of the cake mysteriously disappeared before the birthday girl could blow out the candles.
meanings.sent4: The residua of the storm lingered in the form of fallen branches and scattered leaves.
meanings.sent5: The detective carefully collected the residua from the crime scene for analysis.

meanings.definition: Residua: Remaining after a process or event.
meanings.sent1: The residua of the paint job were a few drips on the floor.
meanings.sent2: She found residua of sand in her shoes after the beach trip.
meanings.sent3: The residua of the melted ice cream formed a sticky puddle on the table.
meanings.sent4: The residua of the argument hung in the air long after they had made up.
meanings.sent5: The residua of the fireworks display sparkled in the night sky.
